#summary Application Description

= Application Description =

mobilesynth is an open source classic monophonic synthesizer, for live performance.

Features
  * Monophonic, playing one note at a time like a class synthesizer
  * Two Oscillators, each featuring:
    * Square, Triangle, Sawtooth, Reverse Sawtooth waves
    * 5 octaves
  * Glide between notes (Lag Processor)
  * Oscillator 2 fine tine (more than one full octave)
  * Oscillator sync
  * Tremelo/Wave modulation
  * Vibrato/Pitch modulation
  * Filter modulation
  * Volume Envelope (ADSR)
  * Low Pass Filter
  * Filter Envelope (ADSR)
